meanings.definition: A type of evergreen shrub with compound leaves and red berries.
meanings.sent1: The nandina in our garden has beautiful red berries.
meanings.sent2: I planted a nandina shrub near the fence.
meanings.sent3: The nandina berries looked like tiny red jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The nandina shrub stood out among the other plants like a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The nandina's red berries added a pop of color to the yard.

meanings.definition: The red berries of the nandina shrub.
meanings.sent1: I collected some nandina berries to make a wreath.
meanings.sent2: The birds love to eat the nandina berries.
meanings.sent3: The nandina berries rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her lips were as red as nandina berries.
meanings.sent5: The nandina berries looked like little drops of blood on the snow.
